title: Konstantin Podkorytov
text:
Konstantin Aleksandrovich Podkorytov (; born 8 February 1986) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played 3 seasons in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a> and <a href="FC%20Ufa">FC Ufa</a>.
